title: Exxon Mobil Fire at Baytown, Texas, Refinery Injures Four
sub_head: No fatalities were reported in what law-enforcement officials called  a major industrial accident
body:
An industrial accident at an Exxon Mobil Corp. plant in Texas left several people injured Thursday morning, law-enforcement officials said.
A fire, possibly the result of an explosion, occurred at a plant in Baytown, Texas, about 25 miles east of Houston, leaving at least four people injured. Three were airlifted to the hospital, the Harris County Sheriffâ€™s Office said.
